cause.description:
Actually, you can substitute "Darfur" for
"Jamaica"
"Haiti"
or any other Third World-type country.
This Cause was established in Ms. Whalen's 8th period this past school year, by a group of "obnoxious smartass students." [Whalenator.]
1. If your extremities emit foul odors, fuck no you can't be in our group.
2. By removing your shoes, you're saving starving kids, women being raped, victims of genocide, curing AIDS, and providing TB meds to Third World Countries. It's that fucking easy.
cause.name: Shoes Off For Darfur.
